debian_arm32.name: Debian ARM32
debian_arm32.qemu: qemu-system-arm -M virt -cpu cortex-a15 -m 2G -smp 2 -kernel vmlinuz-5.10.0-12-armmp-lpae -initrd initrd.img-5.10.0-12-armmp-lpae -append "root=/dev/vda2 apparmor=0" -drive if=none,file=disk.qcow2,format=qcow2,id=hd -device virtio-blk-device,drive=hd -netdev user,id=mynet,hostfwd=tcp::22201-:22 -device virtio-net-device,netdev=mynet

debian_arm64.name: Debian ARM64
debian_arm64.qemu: qemu-system-aarch64 -M virt -cpu cortex-a53 -m 2G -smp 2 -kernel vmlinuz-5.10.0-12-arm64 -initrd initrd.img-5.10.0-12-arm64 -append "root=/dev/vda2 apparmor=0" -drive if=none,file=disk.qcow2,format=qcow2,id=hd -device virtio-blk-device,drive=hd -netdev user,id=mynet,hostfwd=tcp::22202-:22 -device virtio-net-device,netdev=mynet

debian_i386.name: Debian i386
debian_i386.qemu: qemu-system-i386 -cpu max -m 2G -smp 2 -kernel vmlinuz-5.10.0-12-686-pae -initrd initrd.img-5.10.0-12-686-pae -append "root=/dev/sda1 apparmor=0" -hda disk.qcow2 -netdev user,id=mynet,hostfwd=tcp::22203-:22 -device e1000,netdev=mynet

debian_x64.name: Debian x64
debian_x64.qemu: qemu-system-x86_64 -m 2G -smp 2 -kernel vmlinuz-5.10.0-12-amd64 -initrd initrd.img-5.10.0-12-amd64 -append "root=/dev/sda1 apparmor=0" -hda disk.qcow2 -netdev user,id=mynet,hostfwd=tcp::22204-:22 -device e1000,netdev=mynet

windows.name: Windows
windows.qemu: qemu-system-x86_64 -m 3G -smp 2 -rtc clock=host,base=localtime -drive if=pflash,format=raw,readonly=on,file=edk2-x86_64-code.fd -hda disk.qcow2 -netdev user,id=mynet,hostfwd=tcp::22205-:22 -device e1000,netdev=mynet -vga qxl -device qemu-xhci -device usb-tablet

commands.Build (32 bit): rm -rf node_modules build && C:\Node32\node32.cmd npm install --production
commands.Build (64 bit): rm -rf node_modules build && C:\Node64\node64.cmd npm install --production
